# navigationControllerSupportedInterfaceOrientations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the complete set of supported interface orientations for the navigation controller, as determined by the delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func navigationControllerSupportedInterfaceOrientations(_ navigationController: UINavigationController) -> UIInterfaceOrientationMask
```

## Parameters

- **navigationController**: The navigation controller

## Return Value

One of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientationMask] constants that represents the set of interface orientations supported by the navigation controller.

## Supporting custom transition animations

- **navigationController(_:animationControllerFor:from:to:)**: Allows the delegate to return a noninteractive animator object for use during view controller transitions.
- **navigationController(_:interactionControllerFor:)**: Allows the delegate to return an interactive animator object for use during view controller transitions.
- **navigationControllerPreferredInterfaceOrientationForPresentation(_:)**: Returns the preferred orientation for presentation of the navigation controller, as determined by the delegate.
